name: get_analytics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sms77io.
Tool description: Send SMS & text-to-speech messages, perform phone number lookups and much more via seven.io.
API description: Retrieve detailed statistics for your account using the specified parameters through the API.

p.description: The API Key to authenticate the API request.

start.description: The start date for the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to 30 days ago if not specified.

label.description: Filter data by a specific label. Allowed values: 'all' (default) or a specific label.

end.description: The end date for the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Defaults to the current date if not specified.

subaccounts.description: Receive the data only for the main account, all your (sub-)accounts or only for specific subaccounts. Allowed values: 'only_main', 'all' or subaccount ID.

group_by.description: Specifies the grouping of the data.
